## MapOptions interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface MapOptions<M = any, C = any> extends ViewOptions 
```
**Extends:** [ViewOptions](./webmap.viewoptions.md)

|  [controls?](./webmap.mapoptions.controls.md) |  | Array&lt;keyof [MapControls](./webmap.mapcontrols.md) \| C&gt; | _(Optional)_ List of controls that will be initialized when creating a map instance. It can be defined as a string, then points to the corresponding entry in the \[controlAdapters\](webmap-api\#MapAdapter). |
